structure.unit: Protection And Care Of Children, And Proceedings Against Them

law.catch_line: Diagnostic Services By Department Of Youth Services
law.text: The department of youth services shall maintain and provide diagnostic services for the purpose of providing the diagnostic studies and making the reports and recommendations provided for under section sixty-eight A, and the department may provide offices and facilities for such diagnostic services, at such places in the commonwealth as will best serve the needs of the several courts.
